# js-format-cpf

Lib to format CPF

#### Javascript example:
```js
const cpf = require('js-format-cpf');  
console.log(cpf.formatCPF("49075215029"))
``` 
Output:
490.752.150-29

#### Typescript example:
```ts 
import { formatCPF } from 'js-format-cpf'
console.log(formatCPF("49075215029")
```

Output:
490.752.150-29
